description: This file defines Express.js routes for handling CRUD operations and search functionality for notes in a backend API. It sets up routing, middleware, and Swagger API documentation annotations.

methods.name: router.get
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list notes, with authentication and optional search/filter/sort/pagination.

methods.name: router.post
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new note.

methods.name: router.get('/:id')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific note by ID.

methods.name: router.put('/:id')
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update a specific note by ID.

methods.name: router.delete('/:id')
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a specific note by ID.
